verbs.description: [ARG1: petition] [V: circulating] to move halloween to a saturday move halloween that not such a scary prospect for a group petitioning for that very thing on change org the halloween costume association started a petition asking president trump to move halloween to the last saturday of october rather than the fixed date of oct 31 costume association trump
